Functionality: 3 tabs: project tab, sounds wave tab, labels tab. Can open new track, has custom file explorer. Automatically saves the labels for track. Works only on macOs. User can manually load the labels for a current track.
Automatically saves the labels for a track.
Has functionality to save labels - Project tab.
Can open the file (mp3, wav) - Project tab.
Has grouped buttons and 3 tabs. Project tab placholder, sound wave tab, labels tab.
Can show labels list. Able to play from selected label.
It's possible to place labels on the sound wave. Can show labels on the sound wave.
Can scroll the sound wave, able to zoom.
Can render the sound wave, and play from cursor.
